# Research

## CSV Parsing Libraries

### Node.js Options

- csv-parse: mature, stream-based
- papaparse: browser + node, auto-detect

## PDF Generation

- pdfkit: low-level, flexible
- puppeteer: HTML-to-PDF, good for templates

## Findings

- csv-parse recommended for server-side processing
- puppeteer recommended for template-based PDF
